scripts.merge-browser: rm -r dist ; mkdir -p dist && cp lib/bson-browser.js dist/hp-client-lib.js && cat lib/hp-client-lib.js >> dist/hp-client-lib.js
scripts.minify-browser: terser --compress --mangle reserved=['Binary','Buffer'] -- dist/hp-client-lib.js > dist/hp-client-lib.min.js && rm dist/hp-client-lib.js
scripts.build-browser: npm run merge-browser && npm run minify-browser
